# and convert to mmr by multiplying by 1.0E-6 * 1.5194. See co2_annmean_gl.txt
# for data use conditions.
# 2019-2021 added by Patrick McGuire, with this conversion factor.
# 2022 & 2023 added by Garry Hayman, with this conversion factor
# First line is 1980, last line is 2023 (estimate 419.2 ppm).
